dateline.name: 431 Stevens st.Street / cor West. / Camden, N.J.

body.p: Yours of 23d just rec'dreceived—Nothing new or different with me. Come—When you once find the way you'll discover its very easy—A bright pleasant forenoon here at last. Am going out now.
